description:
This video based course is designed to prepare you to take and pass the Juniper JNCIA-Junos exam. This course is updated and current for the JN0-102 exam which is the most current exam. It includes video lectures on all exam topics along with a step-by-step video guide to setting up your Junos lab in GNS3. Not only do I provide students with a real vSRX image to use in the labs but each section has review questions and lab activities. This course is also designed to give you the skills and knowledge you need to begin working with Juniper hardware in the real world. This course is designed to be direct and to the point to fulfill your learning objectives without wasting your valuable time.

What you get:

42 high quality videos based on the JNCIA-Junos exam topics

Video instructions on how to set up your labs in GNS3

A vSRX virtual machine included to use in your labs

Lab exercises to practice what you have learned

Practice questions at the end of each section

Lots of extra Subnetting and Binary conversion practice questions

Guidance on how to pass the JNCIA-Junos exam throughout the course

Please join me and begin your journey with Junos here!
title: Juniper JNCIA Intro to Junos
